reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Chen is an exceptional professor. Her lectures are engaging and she explains complex concepts clearly.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Rodriguez brings history to life with his passionate teaching style. Sometimes his assignments can be overwhelming.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Watson's labs are incredibly well-organized. She's always available for extra help and genuinely cares about student success.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Kim is knowledgeable, but his teaching style can be confusing. Office hours are helpful for clarification.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Patel's lectures are fascinating. She incorporates real-world examples that make the material easy to understand and remember.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Johnson's passion for literature is contagious. His essay prompts are challenging but thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Gonzalez explains complex chemical concepts with ease. Her problem-solving sessions are invaluable.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Lee's lectures are dry and hard to follow. The textbook is more helpful than his classes.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Cohen encourages critical thinking and class discussions. Her grading can be harsh, but feedback is always constructive.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson knows his subject well, but sometimes struggles to explain concepts to non-physics majors.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Brown's lectures are like guided tours through art museums. Her enthusiasm for the subject is infectious.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Ivanov presents balanced viewpoints on complex political issues. His debates are engaging and thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor's field trips and hands-on experiments make learning about the environment exciting and relevant.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Chang's lectures can be abstract and difficult to follow, but his office hours are very helpful.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is at the forefront of her field. Her lectures are challenging but incredibly rewarding.

reviews.subject: Marketing
reviews.review: Prof. Green brings real-world marketing experience to the classroom. His group projects are excellent preparation for the industry.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Anderson's storytelling approach to anthropology makes every lecture captivating. Her assignments encourage creative thinking.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Prof. Wong rushes through material too quickly. It's difficult to keep up with his pace during lectures.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Richards makes the study of language fascinating. Her assignments can be challenging, but they're always enlightening.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. Foster's passion for music is evident in every lecture. He makes complex theoretical concepts accessible and enjoyable.
